EMBED_DESCRIPTION: What would you like to update of the tag `{{tagName}}`?
REPLACE_NAME: Write down the new tag name you want to replace with `{{tagName}}`
TAGNAME_EXISTS: A tag with name `{{newTagName}}` already exists. Provide a different tagname.
WRONG_TAGNAME_FORMAT: The tagname must not contain any special characters or spaces
TAGNAME_LONG: Tag name too long. Try less than 20 characters
REPLACE_NAME_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to replace the tagname from `{{oldTag}}` to `{{newTag}}`?
REPLACE_NAME_SUCCESSFULL: The tagname has been successfully updated from `{{oldTag}}` to `{{newTag}}`
REPLACE_EMOJI: Send the new tag emoji you want to replace with {{emoji}}
TAGEMOJI_EXISTS: A tag with emoji {{newEmoji}} already exists. Provide a different tagemoji
WRONG_TAGEMOJI_FORMAT: A tag with emoji {{newEmoji}} already exists. Provide a different tagemoji
REPLACE_EMOJI_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to replace the tag emoji from {{oldEmoji}} to {{newEmoji}}?
REPLACE_EMOJI_SUCCESSFULL: The tagemoji has been successfully updated from {{oldEmoji}} to {{newEmoji}}
